metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

links.text: SVG defines vector-based graphics in XML

content.text: SVG defines vector-based graphics in XML , which can be directly embedded in HTML pages.
content.html: SVG defines vector-based graphics in XML, which can be directly embedded in HTML pages.

content.text: SVG graphics are scalable, and do not lose any quality if they are zoomed or resized:
content.html: SVG graphics are scalable, and do not lose any quality if they are zoomed or resized:

content.text: The HTML <canvas> element element is used to draw graphics, on the fly, with JavaScript:
content.html: The HTML <canvas> element element is used to draw graphics, on the fly, with JavaScript:

content.text: The graphic above shows four elements: a red rectangle, a gradient rectangle, a multicolor rectangle, and a multicolor text inside a <canvas> element.
content.html: The graphic above shows four elements: a red rectangle, a gradient rectangle, a multicolor rectangle, and a multicolor text inside a <canvas> element.

content.text: JavaScript libraries are used for both Artificial Intelligence graphs and other charts:
content.html: JavaScript libraries are used for both Artificial Intelligence graphs and other charts:

content.text: Here is an example of a 3D pie made with Google Chart:
content.html: Here is an example of a 3D pie made with Google Chart:

content.text: Google Maps lets you embed maps in HTML pages.
content.html: Google Maps lets you embed maps in HTML pages.
